sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of FLIR Systems, topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 12.1%.
Year to date, FLIR Systems has lost about 16.1% of its value.
And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is Salesforce.com, trading down 6.9%.
Salesforce.com Inc is lower by about 6.8% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Fortinet, trading down 6.9%, and Equifax, trading up 5.1% on the day.
